item.description:
Now that we've had a taste of the other Americas, it's time to switch continents.

We will enjoy the tastes of Asia at Pho Boston in West Hartford. This food is tasty, inexpensive, and authentic (and probably healthier than Chinese take-out).

If 15 people attend, assistant organizer Ken has agreed to teach a traditional Vietnamese folk dance. He is already preparing his costume, so be sure to RSVP ASAP!

Their website: www.phoboston.com

group.name: The Ethnic Dining Enthusiasts Meetup Group

item.name: A Taste of Viet Nam--Pho Boston
